lead_paragraph: President Obama has long opposed the measure, warning that it could expose the United States to a raft of lawsuits by people in other countries.

headline.print_headline: House Passes  Bill Allowing  9/11 Lawsuits;  Veto Expected
headline.main: House Passes Bill Allowing 9/11 Lawsuits Against Saudi Arabia; White House Hints at Veto

snippet: President Obama has long opposed the measure, warning that it could expose the United States to a raft of lawsuits by people in other countries....
abstract: House passes bill that will allow families of victims of Sept 11, 2001, attacks to sue Saudi Arabia for country's role in terrorist plot; Pres Obama has said he strongly opposes bill and will likely veto it.
